member.name: M:VisualStudioObjectives.VisualStudioObectivesPackage.IsSolutionUnsavedAsync(EnvDTE.Solution,System.Boolean)
member.summary: Searches projects and project items for unsaved changes.
member.param: The solution to search for unsaved changes.
If true, save the items if they are unsaved.
member.returns: True is unsaved changes are found.

member.name: M:VisualStudioObjectives.VisualStudioObectivesPackage.IsProjectItemsUnsavedAsync(EnvDTE.ProjectItem,System.Boolean)
member.summary: Searches project items for unsaved changes. Also checks the sub items. (recursive)
member.param: The project item to search. Includes sub items if the item is a folder.
If true, will save the item if unsaved changes are found.
member.returns: Returns true is the item is unsaved.

member.name: M:VisualStudioObjectives.VisualStudioObectivesPackage.GetRegistrySettings
member.summary: Gets the settings from the Registry.

member.name: M:VisualStudioObjectives.VisualStudioObectivesPackage.IsSolutionLoadedAsync
member.summary: Check if the solution is loaded.
member.returns: True if the solution is loaded.

member.name: M:VisualStudioObjectives.VisualStudioObectivesPackage.GetStartValues
member.summary: Gets the starting values for the WorkItem.

member.name: M:VisualStudioObjectives.VisualStudioObectivesPackage.GetCurrentValues
member.summary: Gets the current values for the WorkItem.

member.name: M:VisualStudioObjectives.VisualStudioObectivesPackage.GetHEADItems
member.summary: Gets the HEAD items from the git logs if they are available.

member.name: M:VisualStudioObjectives.VisualStudioObectivesPackage.SaveDataAsync
member.summary: Saves the WorkItem data to file.
